mapper.select: SELECT id, auth_identifier, user_code, username, auth_type, login_status, message, ip_address, user_agent, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, remark, version FROM iam_login_log WHERE deleted = 0 AND auth_identifier = #{authIdentifier} AND user_code = #{userCode} AND username = #{username} AND auth_type = #{authType} AND login_status = #{loginStatus} AND ip_address = #{ipAddress} AND create_time >= #{timeFrom} AND create_time <= #{timeTo} ORDER BY id DESC
